Fighters.Name: The Wayward Sisters
Fighters.Text:
BUBBLING BREW
Your cards go into your cauldron instead of your discard pile.
After you attack, you may cast one spell that you have the ingredients for. If you do, discard all the cards in your cauldron.

Card.Name: Double, Double 🦎
Card.Text: During combat: Increase the value of this card by +1 for each different ingredient symbol in your cauldron.

Card.Name: All-Seeing Familiar 🦎
Card.Text:
Immediately: Return a card in your discard pile to your cauldron.
After combat: If you won the combat, look at the top card of your deck and put it in your hand or cauldron.

Card.Name: Hurly-Burly 🐍
Card.Text: During combat: Reveal the top card of your deck. Your opponent chooses one: - put that card in your hand - put that card in your cauldron and add its BOOST value to this card's value.

Card.Name: Fire Burn And Cauldron Bubble 🦇
Card.Key: The Wayward Sisters_Fire Burn And Cauldron Bubble 🦇
Card.Text: Immediately: Return a card in your discard pile to your cauldron.
Card.Script: ../The Wayward Sisters/Fire Burn And Cauldron Bubble 🦇.lua

Card.Name: The Stars Align 🦎
Card.Text: During combat: The value of this card is equal to the number of different zones all of your fighters are in.

Card.Name: Curious Familiar 🦇
Card.Text: After combat: Return a card in your cauldron to your hand.

Card.Name: Ward 🦇
Card.Text: After combat: Place the opposing fighter in any space in your fighter's zone.

Card.Name: Toil And Trouble 🐍
Card.Text: During combat: Increase the value of this card by +1 for each different ingredient symbol in your cauldron.

Card.Name: Pricking Of My Thumbs 🐍
Card.Key: The Wayward Sisters_Pricking Of My Thumbs 🐍
Card.Text: After combat: Deal damage to the opposing fighter equal to the amount of combat damage your fighter took.

Card.Name: Unnatural Remedy 🐍
Card.Text: Immediately: Discard up to 3 cards from your cauldron. For each one, choose a fighter to recover 1 health. (You may choose the same fighter more than once.)

Card.Name: Something Wicked This Way Comes 🦇
Card.Key: The Wayward Sisters_Something Wicked This Way Comes 🦇
Card.Text: Cast any spell. Then, cast a different spell. (Do not discard any cards from your cauldron to cast these spells.)
Card.Script: ../The Wayward Sisters/Something Wicked This Way Comes 🦇.lua

Card.Name: Prophecy 🦎
Card.Text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Put 2 of them in your hand and the other 2 back on top of your deck in any order.
